website_summaries.verdict: There are lots of applications for this high-output printer, which costs a little more than some budget 3D printers but is still a very good deal.
cons: Printer is enclosed and needs to be ventilated if using PLA filament
Printer does not automatically sense if filament is running out

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, tons of great features.
customer_reviews.text: Qidi has yet again created another fantastic printer. I own 6x QIDI X-One's. This X-Smart improves on them in many ways for only $100 more! Removable print bed surface, larger print volume and improved menus, plus bundled software for those newer to 3d printing. This is a fantastic printer for anyone getting in to 3D printing. I run a small print farm with 16+ printers, and the QIDI printers are fantastic even for my 24/7 volume production. Very clean printing (currently using hatchbox PLA). Customer service has also been great.
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: Wi-Fi issue and nozzles replacements
customer_reviews.text: Almost 4 months with the x-smart and here's my review, over all this printer is pretty well built there are some flaws like Wi-Fi work randomly can't figure out why that is Qidi tech team was pretty friendly but not really helpful with this subject also expect to spend a fortune on nozzles cause they're not cheap and I've gone through 8 nozzles in 4 months. when i was buying the X-smart the description described a all metal hotend in which is not true they have sensed corrected the description but other than that this printer build quality is good and when it's running it runs like a Ferrari.
customer_reviews.author: rayman119

customer_reviews.title: Know your temps and it will serve you well!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing little printer. I have a degree in industrial design, and we used much more expensive printers at school; this produces prints that look as good as ones that come off of much more expensive machines. Punching above it's weight class is an understatement. I printed the city image with AIO robotics color changing filament at 190°, and at .15mm resolution. The snowflake was printed with Yoyi clear PETG at 205° at .2mm resolution. So far so good... I have run a dozen or so prints with no stringing (so far). The slicer software included works perfectly. I have had zero issues... Love this printer!
customer_reviews.author: DBlvd

customer_reviews.title: Frustration Free 3D Printing!!!
customer_reviews.text: Unboxing to printing took 20 minutes (including leveling the bed!)!! Great quality prints. I’ve had mine for only four days but have completed 14 prints already. I own two other printers (both Are monoprice models), but will be giving those away. Definitely the best printer I’ve experienced so far! Customer service is also prompt & courteous. My box was missing the usb drive & this was rectified immediately to my satisfaction. My next printer will be a Qidi tech resin printer!
customer_reviews.author: Old Guy

customer_reviews.title: OUTSTANDING PERFORMANCE and CUSTOMER SERVICE!
customer_reviews.text: This is an Awesome upgrade from my Qidi XOne2 which still works great! Great Price and EASY to use! I currently own 10 of these for my business and they are VERY reliable and easy to clean fix clogs when they happen. Customer Service is also TOP NOTCH. The Tech Support email is located on the printer and they responded within a day or so and were able to troubleshoot the problem or send a replacement component in a week TOPS!! I am SUPER HAPPY WITH MY X-SMART!! Sadly they are no longer available. I may try the Maker which also looks promising! Thanks QIDI TECH for a GREAT PRODUCT!!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Great 3D printer
customer_reviews.text: My first 3d printer, it worked great right out of the box for about 10 months. I started having prints fail and contacted the help support email. They were very helpful and prompt. I recommend if you have issues with the printer contact the vip support email I’m the manual. I swapped the magnetic build plate that comes with the printer for a cheap mirror one I bought at a local store and it seems to work much better. It is still a printer though, and printing is printing in 2D or 3d you will likely run into issues at some point, but this one has worked well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Detailed prints, extremely easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: The learning curve for this printer is 0. I've had the printer for about a week and have used up the first spool of PLA already with no misprint. I just started trying Kodak ABS and I simply switched over the material type in the included software and it so far prints everything perfectly. The build plate the printer comes with makes it extremely easy to remove your prints and you don't have to mess with any kind of glue or hairspray to get the prints to stick.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Knapke

customer_reviews.title: Great printer/Great Support
customer_reviews.text: This is my first 3D printer and I have had a fantastic experience so far using it. It does have a smaller build volume but it’s good for families because it is enclosed and the build plate is far away from the side of the printer. The touchscreen is easy to use and makes the printer super easy to operate. It prints great and I haven't had any problems with any of the PLA filament I have used (hatchbox,makergeeks,colorfabb,atomic,zyltech). The best part is the fact that the customer service and support has been fantastic and extremely helpful, sending gcode files when I have had a small issue helping me figure out how to get something dialed in just right.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Simple setup. Quick, accurate, easy
customer_reviews.text: Holy cow have 3D Printers come a long way. I built my first one back in 2013 with great difficulty. The whole setup process was smooth this time. Leveling instructions, printing, it all just works and remarkably well. Printing with PLA mostly, no complaints. Would recommend and buy again in a heartbeat. Haven't been able to get the Ethernet connection to work, but the rest of it works so well, it's still 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: USMCPelto

customer_reviews.title: Great Printer!
customer_reviews.text: We have already had so much fun with this! Setup was fast, and my son is thrilled with our tug boat experiment we made him!
customer_reviews.author: Cami M.

customer_reviews.title: Another satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: Just like other reviewers said, we were printing within 30 minutes of unboxing, and have no prior experience with 3D printers. The prints are very high quality. Preteen grandson prints toys from Thingiverse. I plan to print hobby items. After many prints, we had to unclog the extruder. The trouble shooting videos helped us accomplish this. Always use the glue stick on the build plate. I use the purple disappearing glue stick. TIP: Clean the build plate with spray window cleaner after every few uses. Allow to dry and the build plate is ready for re-use. The build plate & extruder get hot, so supervise kids. We LOVE this printer!!
customer_reviews.author: Marchelle D. Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely awesome 3D printer (my very first one, as well)
customer_reviews.text: Amazing printer from my experience with it over the past 2 months. I'd bought the printer to create miniatures and props/terrain for D&D, and it has done an outstanding job at that. I'm using Simplify3D for printing, and I have made my own custom profile for it that is working very well. I've really fallen in love with 3D printing because of this thing - printing more and more than I ever thought I would be. My advise - buy it unless you just absolutely need a larger build volume. This one's a winner.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Thompson

customer_reviews.title: First Class Product Support
customer_reviews.text: Have had printer for 7 months now and am impressed. Excellent prints, easy to use out of the box, solid construction. Had minor problem with the X axis end stop just before Xmas. Received a response from QIDI Tech Support within 10 minutes of emailing them. Replacement received within a week. Not only did they send the X replacement, but also ones for the Y & Z as well as all the required cables. Best service I have had in my 4 years of owning various brands of 3D printers. No one else has come close.
customer_reviews.author: 6cwayne

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: After few minor hick-ups during initial set-up we were printing good quality in about 2 hours from opening the box. This was a gift to my 14 year old son. He got going with the CAD program within minutes and was printing good quality objects the next day (jewelry for his mother, Baby Yoda for his brother etc). Great product for great price!
customer_reviews.author: Father of Three

customer_reviews.title: Out of the Box the best printer I have used
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box, I leveled the platform installed the software and at default print settings it rivaled my last printer. The heated bed is super thick slowing the print start but it keeps the enclosed case warm allowing ABS the slow cooling necessary to eliminate warp. I slicer software is easy to use and the magnetic bed with flex plate in ingenious for getting parts to release without undue stress on the print table. I highly recommend this printer
customer_reviews.author: Leif Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Very simple to set up and use
customer_reviews.text: this product was as advertised, simple to set up and use. i did make the mistake of putting on the spool in the wrong direction which caused some problems, which was my fault. but so far excellent experience. update 6.11.2019 still working great, just cleared a plug in the line, was a simple switch out, and went back to printing the same day. Highly recommenced for beginners like myself
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Spool holder issue and loudish. Touch is awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Small compact. Almost works out of the box. Ringing in the print. Is quite loud due to the metal frame and no dampeners on table. The filament was brittle but free sample. Just not what I wanted in a machine as an all in one. Biggest peev and it’s minor. Spool holder does not fit even amazon brand spoils. It’s too narrow for most spools. Major pro - all enclosed. Touch screen is amazing sensitive.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Are Si

customer_reviews.title: I recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: This printer rocks so far... I have made some large and some small prints. It does make a bit of a mess with the stringy bits between scaffolding, but that could be a setting I need to adjust. The top lid kind of socks, but doesn't impede the print... I usually take it off while printing. Otherwise... I recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and awesome support!
customer_reviews.text: Where do I start. First the support is beyond amazing. First they ask how everything is going which I had a few maintenance questions which they answered promptly. They continue to answer questions and truly do a great job taking care of this 3D printing newbie. The printer was very easy to setup. Leveling is a breeze. The screen on the printer is very clear and easy to get the hang of. I would highly recommend picking this guy up, in fact I did too my boss. Buy it you will be glad that you did!
customer_reviews.author: kevin s.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Printer for Small to Medium PLA Printing
customer_reviews.text: This printer prints PLA objects very precisely for the price range. Here are my settings for PLA: Extruder Temp: 180 degrees Hot bed Temp: 60 degrees first layer / 50 degrees other layers Print Speed: 40 mm/s Layer height 0.15mm Other options set on default. You my get a some stringing on more complex parts, but it can be easily rubbed off with your fingers. I have not had the same results with PET-G filament. But I think my PET-G had moisture it in.
customer_reviews.author: Mike S

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Prints
customer_reviews.text: Have run about 5 Kg thru the printer thus far. The removable magnetic base is awesome, I would not want to go back. I would pick up an order for an additional set of removable bases that way you can keep printing.
customer_reviews.author: chrisP

customer_reviews.title: Good prints, easy to use recommended. Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: The printer works great. The The slicing software is the most critical part but once everything is adjusted correctly and the bed height is adjusted correctly this printer prints perfect Great customer service
customer_reviews.author: Bear

customer_reviews.title: Great first 3D printer for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first 3D printer, so there was a small learning curve getting to know the machine and 3D printing in general. Once I practiced with some PLA and re-learned how to use SketchUp I was off to the races. I made simple parts, though, so not a lot of curves and other features were needed for my parts. When producing a lot of the same part, or lots of different ones, it would be helpful to have another printer and at these prices they will pay for themselves!
customer_reviews.author: A. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME PRINTER!!!
customer_reviews.text: Printer came as described..... had an issue with the extruder and qidi techs customer service hooked me up with some upgraded parts. Ive been printing since!!! One of the best printers for the money if you ask me, plus their customer service is spot on.
customer_reviews.author: sam b.

customer_reviews.title: Worked for a month and now nothing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this printer because of all of the wonderful reviews but unfortunately after a month or so all we can print is just some string. Nothing seems to print anymore. My husband and son have tried to take it apart to fix the problem but it still doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara T.

customer_reviews.title: Good Value Fast and Accurate. Support is superb
customer_reviews.text: Great unit with a wide range of materials that are printable. Manufacturer support is excellent. Speed is good as is resolution. I had problems (my setup) and they helped me revise and correct in hours. I’m now happily printing parts for my son’s 3D printer (obviously made by someone else). They may be based in another place but they respond and resolve like no one else.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce P.

customer_reviews.title: Great little 3D printer.
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure what to expect from this low cost 3D printer but I really like it. Well worth the price. It looks great, prints great and my support questions were answered quickly.
customer_reviews.author: DrDHD

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: I have to say, this printer is great! It works well, and while I’m still learning to use it , it is a good quality printer. And while I’ve had trouble a few times, their amazing customer support has gone the extra mile to help me fix my minor issues. And they’ve sent me parts every time I had a problem with my printer (one of those times was due to me moving and a part was missing when I unboxed it) I highly recommend this printer to anyone who wants to get started 3D printing and doesn’t know what one to buy
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Great value for ready to go printer
customer_reviews.text: Had for 2 weeks, dozens of parts already. Worked great right our of the box. Great leveling program, a nice flexible magnetic work surface that makes it easy to peel off your part, good kit of tools and spares. Documentation a bit weak for a actually printing (great for setup etc). But once figured this out its been flawless. 3 kids between 6 and 11 are all designing and printing with minimal help. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: John G. Meyers

customer_reviews.title: Great 3D Printer
customer_reviews.text: I am new to 3D printing and I have to say this printer is awesome. After I figured out the right files to download for my builds it was easy. I get perfect builds every time. If your new to 3D printing this printer is for you.
customer_reviews.author: AL NELLIGAN

customer_reviews.title: Great fit for our first printer but would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know before printing we would only use PLA plastic which does not use an enclosed printer. I would have spent the money on an open one with 2x the build plate.
customer_reviews.author: woodsman

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and prints well
customer_reviews.text: It's my first 3d printer and I am pretty happy with it. Simple slicer and printing over wifi - makes it easy to use. Technical support is quick and great!
customer_reviews.author: Eugene

customer_reviews.title: Greatest Service Ever!
customer_reviews.text: So I got this awesome 3d printer and I unfortunately clogged the hot end. From there my printer kept giving me problems. I contacted support and May went above and beyond to help me resolve my issues It took three months for everything to get back to normal. I am so blown away with how helpful May and her team at Qidi were in this situation. Great printer, beautiful prints they have discontinued this printer and the best service.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Josiah

customer_reviews.title: Great printer, better support
customer_reviews.text: The printer was great for the first two months I had it. Got some really high quality prints. Recently none of my layers are lining up, and I haven't been able to find any support articles about repairing this issue. Edit: Got in touch with support. It was pretty quick once I found the email, and they were very thorough and helpful. Printer is working well again.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Herrin

customer_reviews.title: I will buy QIDI again.
customer_reviews.text: I have had the QIDI X Smart printer for 1 year. I love it and highly recommend it! It comes ready to print and is very sturdy and well made. I print almost 24-7 and will buy QIDI again. The QIDI slicing software is great. I asked them if it was possible to have the print stop automatically at specific heights so that I can change the filament to a new color. They upgraded the software to allow this and it had saved me lots of time. The customer service is great!
customer_reviews.author: Bad Andy

customer_reviews.title: Good Customer Support
customer_reviews.text: I have received good customer support from QIDI Tech with quick responses from email inquiries. I would recommend this printer for beginners due to the ease of use and set up
customer_reviews.author: Rolland H

customer_reviews.title: Great little printer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little printer. It works better than my other home printer which I paid much more for. Very easy to use, clean prints. I love the touchscreen and the magnetic, removable printing plate. Great for anyone who is new to printing and well worth the price. We have had zero problems with it.
customer_reviews.author: Christian V Almanza Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: I have never been super talented at computers or technology but I was able to assemble this printer on my own following the user guide and I have been able to 3D print several items for my students!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Hobbs

customer_reviews.title: No tech support!!!
customer_reviews.text: I did not recieve the flash drive with the printer files!! I know have a box that lights up and doesn't print. Tried emailing the address that came with the printer and comes back as bad address!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use to make anything in your mind a reality. Creative and fun
customer_reviews.author: nataku

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first printer and the setup and first prints was very easy. I’ve had to do no adjustments and the process was very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and excellent customer support to boot!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for a couple girls ages 10-12 and it has been so much fun. It's easy to use and versatile. We had a problem with filament clogging the extruder, emailed customer support and got a reply immediately with steps to address it. They were super helpful. Glad to have made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Momoftwo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome printer
customer_reviews.text: Great printer. Very good quality. And, the customer support is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Leeanna Haugen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent prints right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something that would produce fairly good prints right out of the box. After following the leveling process and feeding filament, the X-smart was ready to rock. So far, it has delivered impressively well on both its included filament and several Hatchbox PLA filaments (haven't tested with ABS yet). Can't beat it for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Sal Bezos

customer_reviews.title: Beats them all !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Have 4 other types of printers and this is now my go to printer.
customer_reviews.author: jrseigle

customer_reviews.title: Works great right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: I've had my printer for a few months now and it has been performing great. I've been able to do multi-day prints without any concern of malfunction from this printer. Now I only wish I had a bigger one :) This printer is a good buy if you want something simple to use and don't want to fiddle with things.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Trausch

customer_reviews.title: Perfect intro to 3d printing for our family!
customer_reviews.text: I can't imagine using a 3d printer without the removable print bed surface. This is so easy to use right out of the box! Customer service is fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Candace Gipson

customer_reviews.title: Really great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love my X-Smart 3D Printer. I've designed and printed countless items for around the house, all quite functional. I call the printer my "Problem Solver".
customer_reviews.author: Glen A Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Great X Smart 3D Printer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great printer right out of the box. I am not new to 3d printing and have tried other printers. I have been using it pretty much non stop for the past month with zero issues. The print quality is fantastic and money well spent. I am totally satisfied and felt compelled to leave a five star review. Thanks Qidi Tech!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Too complicated to set up.
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t find a tech that knew how to install this so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy A.

customer_reviews.title: Customer service is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to printer! I had a major problem when I first bought it. Thanks to the wonderful customer service, they sent me everything I needed to get it running perfectly. Great for the price!
customer_reviews.author: lydia merrix

customer_reviews.title: Great printer, my first, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Had printer one year now, really does a nice job. Looks great, quiet. Printed many small items I have found off internet as well as many I have made using openscad.
customer_reviews.author: lw

customer_reviews.title: Everything you want in a 3D printer
customer_reviews.text: High quality printer for much less than other brands, comes assembled, and decent sized magnetic bed. Any problems that arise will most likely get fixed by customer service within 24 hours of contacting them. Customer service alone makes it worthwhile.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reliable company with excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.text: The printer was exactly as described in the description, delivery was quick, the quality of the models are great and the post sales service is phenomenal! The service team has been excellent and answered all my questions and went above and beyond!
customer_reviews.author: Michael P.

customer_reviews.title: Great printer
customer_reviews.text: Pros: -perfect printer for a beginner -great price -simple set up -easy to use -removable magnetic build plate makes it super easy to remove prints -makes quality prints -I like that it is enclosed -my last printer didn't have a heated bed, this one does and it makes a HUGE difference -CUSTOMER SERVICE IS AMAZING Cons- -any con I can think of was fixed with customer support
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I’m very impressed with this product. It’s affordable but good quality. I love the design also. Tech support, May was very helpful. She always reply to me quickly and very supportive. She even created stl file for me. I will buy their product again!
customer_reviews.author: Mariko

customer_reviews.title: Patience
customer_reviews.text: The quality of your prints is directly proportional to your desire to study the characteristics of the particular filaments and sometimes experiment with settings, generally lower temperatures than advertised. Do not blame this printer, it just works.
customer_reviews.author: Lance Laettner

customer_reviews.title: This is an Amazing printer
customer_reviews.text: I bought the printer for printing my prototype 3D models and I am satisfied by the quality of the print. It is ready to print straight out of the box. Thanks to Amazon for the shipment and good delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Malachi Bundi

customer_reviews.title: Best quality for the money
customer_reviews.text: Works wonderful and easy to use and the customer service for any question or problem is great. I recommend this printer !
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyn Petrillo

customer_reviews.title: Great 3d Printer
customer_reviews.text: We use a few of these for our business and they run great.
customer_reviews.author: Ab99

customer_reviews.title: Awful would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas present. Will not make small facial features. After 6 months is having problems with even printing now. Very disappointed . My son's friend got the cheaper Ender 3 and it is working great!
customer_reviews.author: Renee M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Printer for the money
customer_reviews.text: I am really impressed with the build quality. It is a sturdy printer with little vibration during prints. The touchscreen is nice to use. The print quality is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: David Bergman

customer_reviews.title: Great 3D printer for a Classroom
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I works great for a classroom and we have printed many new manipulatives for the classroom. I would highly recommend this seller. They have wonderful to work with!!!
customer_reviews.author: Karla Cypert

customer_reviews.title: Grest support
customer_reviews.text: It had a problem after running for a couple of weeks. QIDI's email support was very helpful and they ended up sending me a new extruder to get it running again. Great support.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald H.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the beginner to 3d printing
customer_reviews.text: There's nothing I didn't like about this printer to me this is the best 3d printer for the price. Their customer service is upscale no jumping through hoops or runaround or back and forth calls or emails that end up no where.
customer_reviews.author: Cliff

customer_reviews.title: Good detail printing.
customer_reviews.text: Prints PLA great. ABS had trouble sticking to base and glue plugged extruder.
customer_reviews.author: kwloch

customer_reviews.title: Great first printer
customer_reviews.text: First 3D printer. Build seems VERY solid. Easy to set up and get going (maybe 30 minutes to an hour?). Prints are good quality. Would recommend this printer to anyone in the market for one.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Hanes

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and print quality is good.
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to set up and prints have been great. My kids love it and print with it all the time. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Boats 1

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied with the product(from product to the service)
customer_reviews.text: Great printer and the best after-sale service ever!I would like to highly recommend it to all my friends!
customer_reviews.author: Yen

customer_reviews.title: This is the first 3d printer I bought. I've ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the first 3d printer I bought. I've also had zero experience with a 3d printer other than seeing my friend use his. After doing extensive research on printers I chose this one. The build is incredibly consistent and clean. For $500, I would definetly recomend.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Schwietert

customer_reviews.title: Reviews were spot on
customer_reviews.text: Very responsive company. Great, reasonable 3D printer for a teen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: I bought this machine for 4 months ago, right now, It is really great perfect 3d printer. for me.
customer_reviews.author: sungjik kim

customer_reviews.title: No complaints!
customer_reviews.text: This is really awesome! It prints in great detail and is pretty easy to use. The costumer service is also very helpful
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use printer, great price!
customer_reviews.text: The magnetic plate is also a great feature not commonly found on other printers.
customer_reviews.author: EnderToys

customer_reviews.title: I can say this is an amazing printer and would highly recommend it to anyone
customer_reviews.text: After printing about 100 times, I can say this is an amazing printer and would highly recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: josh rosenthal

customer_reviews.title: He said it was easy to use and the software was intuitive so I ...
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars with minor reservations. My brother has one of these printers and has had zero problems. He said it was easy to use and the software was intuitive so I purchased one. First unit I ordered never showed up. Amazon was quick with a refund as I ordered the second unit. Second unit worked for three prints then the extruder fan stopped working. Amazon again was quick to the rescue and refunded me. I ordered a third unit and it has been amazing to use (so far). With about a dozen prints so far, it's performed very well. I am glad I stuck with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: QIDI TECHNOLOGY 3D Printer, X-smart (Red color version): Fully Metal Structure, 3.5 Inch Touchscreen
feature_bullets: X-Smart 3D Printer features advanced technology such as Wifi connection, Touch screen with intuitive icons, ensure smarter and easier operation.
3D printer kit, equipped with single extruder with extra cooling fan, constructed with aviation aluminum and CNC machining aluminum alloy, ensuring printing quality more stable flexible yet strong.
The enclosure and allow you to print PLA, ABS, TPU and much more. And full metal support is more stable than plastic support. Practical and Stable!
With transparent window, dust-proof and quiet, suitable for household education use or DIY amateurs.

Backed by with One-to-one QIDI TECH service. If you have queries about 3D Printer, feel free to contact our exclusive and fast support service team, we'll reply back to you within 24 hours. Free 6-month warranty is also guaranteed.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
